Package net.objectzoo.delegates

Interface FunctionAsyncResult<R>

  • Type Parameters:
    R - The result type returned by the FunctionAsync
    All Superinterfaces:
    ActionAsyncResult
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AsyncFutureTask
    public interface FunctionAsyncResult<R>
extends ActionAsyncResult
    A FunctionAsyncResult represents the result of an FunctionAsync invocation. Methods are provided to check if the invocation is complete, to wait for its completion, and to check the outcome of the FunctionAsync. The outcome can be checked using the method endReturn() when the FunctionAsync has completed, blocking if necessary until it is ready. Cancellation is performed by the cancel(boolean) method. Additional methods are provided to determine if the FunctionAsync completed normally or was cancelled. Once a FunctionAsync has completed, the FunctionAsync cannot be cancelled.
    Author:
    tilmann
    See Also:
    FunctionAsync

      • cancel

        boolean cancel​(boolean mayInterruptIfRunning)
        Attempts to cancel invocation of this FunctionAsync. This attempt will fail if the FunctionAsync has already completed, has already been cancelled, or could not be cancelled for some other reason. If successful, and this FunctionAsync has not started when cancel) is called, this FunctionAsync should never run. If the FunctionAsync has already started, then the mayInterruptIfRunning parameter determines whether the thread executing this FunctionAsync should be interrupted in an attempt to stop the FunctionAsync.

        After this method returns, subsequent calls to isDone() will always return true. Subsequent calls to isCancelled() will always return true if this method returned true.

        Specified by:
        cancel in interface ActionAsyncResult
        Parameters:
        mayInterruptIfRunning - true if the thread executing this uncAsync should be interrupted; otherwise, in-progress FunctionAsyncs are allowed to complete
        Returns:
        false if the FunctionAsync could not be cancelled, typically because it has already completed normally; true otherwise

      • isCancelled

        boolean isCancelled()
        Returns true if this FunctionAsync was cancelled before it completed normally.
        Specified by:
        isCancelled in interface ActionAsyncResult
        Returns:
        true if this FunctionAsync was cancelled before it completed

      • isDone

        boolean isDone()
        Returns true if this FunctionAsync completed.

        Completion may be due to normal termination, an exception, or cancellation -- in all of these cases, this method will return true.

        Specified by:
        isDone in interface ActionAsyncResult
        Returns:
        true if this FunctionAsync completed
